resources.string: Welcome to QR Scanner\nThis Scanner makes things easier
1.\tScan Using "Scan QRcode" or select an image using "Select Photo from Gallery".
2.\tBased on the result from the QRcode following tasks can be performed:
\tURL: redirect users to the URL in any of the browser.
\t Phone Number: Transfers the phone number to the native dialer app.
\t Email ID: Mail can be Composed and sent using any mail app.
\tWifi: Connects to the wifi and saves the wifi configuration forever.
\tUPI: Redirects the user to any payment app available in the phone.
